item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Well, Its worth a laugh or two.”

* Free admission with your "FunnyBone" T Shirts and Free passes if someone gets them.

http://funnybonecentral.com/ComedyClub/9be6fb46-472d-4929-971e-35f56f6f1657/Hartford_Funny_Bone

----------------

FEATURED COMIC:

 

Brad Williams is a little person who appeared regularly on the show hit Comedy Central show “Mind of Mencia”. In fact, Brad got his start by attending a Carlos Mencia live comedy show. While he was in the crowd Mencia made jokes about dwarfs. The people sitting close to Williams were scared to laugh. Mencia noticed this, then noticed Williams and he asked Brad to join him on stage. Brad cracked a few jokes and impressed Mencia so much that he asked Brad to be his opening act on both the “Mind of Mencia” Tour and the popular “Punisher” Tour. Brad''s ability to make humorous observations that make everyone comfortable with the differences in people is winning over audiences and proving that anyone can overcome their shortcomings.

-----------------------------------------------------------

This event consists of a simple Social Meeting at Adams Mill Upstairs Pub any time between 5:30 pm to 7:00 pm prior to the Thursday evening Comedy performance at the FunnyBone located NEARBY at the Buckland Hill  Mall @ 7:30 sharp.

--------

I have listened to this comedians routine on "You Tube" and it seems He will be OK ??


I will call in and reserve our tables under AL -R  once i see enough have RSVP'eed.

----------

IF YOU HAVE your T shirt---YOU NEED TO BE WEARING YOUR "FUNNY BONE" T SHIRT TO GET YOUR FREE ENTRANCE TICKET .

PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING A "T" SHIRT IF YOU LIKE THE PERFORMANCES (ITS ABOUT 15 BUCKS AND ENTRANCE IS FREE ON EVERY THURSDAY NIGHT PERFORMANCE THAT IS NOT SOME SPECIAL CELEBRITY for the life of the club i guess.. i have had both of mine for 5 years so far..its a real deal).


The Convenient easy Meeting spot prior is at Adams Mill "UPSTAIRS in the pub by the tables near WINDOWS: 5:30 pm to 7:00 pm



In the past i listed Adams Pub only for a few cheaper drinks & now SOME REDUCED PRICE APPETIZERSUpstairs in the PUB area.

The appetizers are $4 and $6, they looked ok, but eat something good at home or on the way if you like.

So far this is the only place i will list as a local bar for a easy meeting spot. We don't stay here very long and we stay to our own area to talk for a short while till its time to head over to the FunnyBone Club.

-------------------
GETTING TO Adam's Mill :
1) Adam's Mill "Happy Hour" UPSTAIRS, in the PUB! 5:00-6:30 (most of us get there about 5:30 depends on traffick..etc) featuring $1 off beer/wine/cocktailsand REDUCE PRICE APPETIZERS

Drinks & food is a bit less costly here than at the funnybone if you need to save some cash.

Get the cheap beer, a Butt Light is i think $2.xx something .. and then a Free night of comedy if you only get water at the wacky bone.....I will say the sweet potatoe fries are good there.....


The FunnyBone charges i think anywhere between 4 - 8 bucks for a drink..but the 8 buck specialty drink lets you keep the glass..ok once in a while we support them too.


So join us at Adams Mill untill we leave @ 7:00 pm -ish for the Funny Bone Comedy Club very nearby,

or meet us in the Funny Bone lobby area near the ticket window.

You can Follow us from Adams Mill if you don't know how to get there.


---
Adam's Mill Restaurant
165 Adams St.
Manchester, CT (860) 646-4039


From Hartford I use:
84 East, take exit 60
a right onto rte 44
then a left onto New State Road by East Cathoholic High Skool,
a right onto Hilliard,
then a left onto Adams..
Adams Mill is on the right a little ways up on the right,
I only use this root because sometimes the traffic is horrendous near the mall..the 2-3 lights..its just easier to avoid em all together..


Heading EAST ON ROUTE 84:
FROM HARTFORD toward Manchester:
Take exit 62, come to the end of the exit, turn right onto Buckland Street, continue straight for less than a mile.
(Buckland Street turns into Adams Street by the Manchester Honda Dealership).
The restaurant is on the left, a brick building set back off the road, look for our wine barrels with our name on them.


Other Directions:
FROM ROUTE 91 NORTH OR SOUTH:
Take exit 35A on to Route 291 EAST
Continue on 291 to exit 5 ( Tolland Turnpike )
At the end of the exit, turn left at the light and go approximately a half mile to the intersection of Tolland Turnpike, Buckland Street & Adams Street.
Turn right onto Adams Street, by the Manchester Honda Dealership
The restaurant is on the left, a brick building set back off the road, look for the wine barrels with ADAMS Mill on them.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Funny Bone is in Buckland Hills Mall , use the *Panera* entrance: 7:00 pm to apx 9:15 pm
194 Buckland Hills Drive
860-432-8600

Remember, here its difficult to talk because its the performer that's talking.

 

Everyone seems to get tired of the Comedy after a while, that's why i didn't post the place for a while and try to separate the events enough so comedy seems fresh again.

I tend to post this event if it seems the comic is OK and isnt just spitting out 1,000's of swear words. usually the ladies have had the best routines or guys with some other unique talent in conjunction with comedy routines.

BUT I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT WILL HAPPEN ON THE ACTUAL PERFORMANCE, PLEASE UNDERSTAND THAT AND BE READY, NOT ALL PERFORMANCES ARE BAD, IN FACT SOME ARE FANTASTIC and will have you laughing the whole time. Look at it this way, you are getting in for a very good deal..


***********************************************************

 


See ya there if you are interested.

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the PUB at a table near the windows.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: JAN 10--Brad Williams @FUNNYBONE----Happy Hour Prior to performance @ Adams Mill
